creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: color photograph of still life with sheer and silky fabrics and red sequined shoe on top of and below a small table with open drawer; vegetable crate label with woman in shorts, sandals and short shirt on a beach at upper left; video image of animated wolf at upper right
markings: [Jane Calvin \'Blushing\' negative 1996 print 1997 4/10], in ink, along lower edge, on back
title: Blushing
